thread.title: Breaking Down British Beauty, According to Burberry - Vogue
thread.title_full: Breaking Down British Beauty, According to Burberry - Vogue

title: Breaking Down British Beauty, According to Burberry - Vogue
text: 9 Burberry Beauty Signatures That Every British Girl Knows By Heart February 19, 2017 9:24 PM by Monica Kim Last fall marked the beginning of a new era for Burberry , one of London’s most iconic fashion houses: the start of buy-now-wear-now, seasonless dressing, and its first coed catwalk. Yet, despite all that, the house’s adherence to classic beauty codes remains true to its DNA. Whether that means hair that works with the country’s famously unpredictable weather or playful makeup that winks at homegrown rock icons, Burberry always pays homage to its roots, especially on It Brits like Cara Delevingne and Jourdan Dunn , who frequent its shows and front rows. Here, in anticipation of today’s [or if we are running tomorrow, say 'tomorrow’s'] show, nine British beauty signatures Burberry has mastered on the runway. 1 / 9 The Smoldering Stare Cara Delevingne’s smoky lids, peeping out from beneath her untamed arches, recall Britain’s underground punk scene—here cheekily paired with a classic trench and ladylike driving gloves. Photo: Getty Images
